title.abbrev: FYI Q/A - for New Internet Users

front.title: FYI on Questions and Answers Answers to Commonly asked "New Internet User" Questions

author.organization: SRI International, Network Information Systems Center

abstract.t: This FYI RFC is one of two FYI's called, "Questions and Answers" (Q/A), produced by the User Services Working Group of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). The goal is to document the most commonly asked questions and answers in the Internet.
